meanings.definition: Steal (v): to take (something) without permission or legal right
meanings.sent1: The mischievous raccoon tried to pilfer the shiny apples from the tree.
meanings.sent2: The thief attempted to pilfer money from the cash register.
meanings.sent3: The sneaky squirrel managed to pilfer all the nuts from the picnic basket.
meanings.sent4: The clever magician could pilfer a card from the deck without anyone noticing.
meanings.sent5: The pirate's plan was to pilfer the treasure chest under the cover of darkness.
